The capital city is Limassol. Limassol District has 6 municipalities and 106 communities. The municipalities are: *Agios Athanasios *Germasogeia *Kato Polemidia *Limassol *Mesa Geitonia *Ypsonas ==References== Category:Republic of Cyprus
